review: I don't usually write reviews, but I thought I should since there are so many options when it comes to streaming. First, it hardly takes up any room and the set up is easy. I do not like a lot of cords around the back of the tv, this simply plugs into the HDMI port and the adapter plugs into the wall. I am pretty tech savvy but I prefer simplicity when I am hooking up things (don't we all!) I immediately started watching Netflix after everything was done. Everything has been a breeze. I've had it for about a month and I love it.
author: R. Coleman

review: Picture quality is great with no flaws when watching T.V. shows or movies. Prime music playlists are very good. Standard remote is not the best game controller, but I don't play many games anyway. I would like to see a YouTube option since they have some good shows too. If NASCAR or Indycar races were available (even on a pay-per-race basis) I'd ditch cable.
